course_description: This course provides intermediate-level training in spoken and written Chinese in cultural context, based on language skills developed in Chinese 201. Attention is given to complex grammatical patterns, discourse characteristics, and discussions of cultural topics.
schedule_location:
MW 8:30am-9:45am in Seney Hall 310
F 8:30am-9:20am in Seney Hall 310
